overview:
Marina Treshchova, CEO and co-founder of Fast Lane Ventures, has a profound experience in Internet Business and Finance, having joined the team of Pascal Clement, President of Direct Group, in 2002. Prior to that Marina had worked with a U.S. telecommunications company for six years. She holds a BA degree in Business and Finance Administration from University of Washington, USA.

In Fast Lane Ventures, founded in 2010, Marina’s primary role is the development, implementation, and operational management of the corporate business activities, setting business targets in line with the Group’s business objectives, identification and development of future business opportunities, control over implementation of best management practices, full operations control within targeted business KPIs, execution of corporate governance system and commercial risk minimization.

degrees.subject: Business and Finance Administration
degrees.institution: School of Business Administration, University of Washington, Seattle

external_links.title: Russia Will See Huge Opportunities For Years
